amendment.description: Amendment provides for the participation of HBCU, Hispanic Serving Institutions and National Indian institutions in fellowships, work-study and employment opportunities within the emerging commercial space industry.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part A of House Report 114-127 to facilitates the participation of HBCU, Hispanic Serving Institutions; National Indian institutions, in fellowships, work-study and employment opportunities in the emerging commercial space industry.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
